system.domainDescription:
A vile alchemy churns in the toad’s gut. As a complication, tension move, or threat , the toad is able to vomit up a thick, nauseating slime that reeks of expensive perfume. It can be incredibly sticky, incredibly slippery (the toad chooses), and carpets CAT area. 

• Actions that require concentration, quick movement, or manual dexterity become hard in the area.

 • It becomes incredibly hard to keep your footing in the area. Any action that requires moving around by the exorcists rolls two risk dice and picks the lowest. 

• The slime dries up when pressure increases, losing these effects.
